recipes.title: Chocolate Brownies
recipes.ingredients: Butter, Sugar, Cocoa powder, Flour, Eggs, Vanilla extract
recipes.steps: 1. Melt butter and mix with sugar. 2. Add eggs and vanilla. 3. Stir in cocoa and flour. 4. Bake in a preheated oven at 350°F for 20-25 minutes. 5. Cool and cut into squares.
